channels.label: Output
channels.description: Output of the last execution of the command

channels.label: Input
channels.description: Input that will be passed as second parameter to the command

channels.label: Exit Value
channels.description: The exit value of the last execution of the command

channels.label: Running
channels.description: Send ON to execute the command and the current state tells whether it is running or not

channels.label: Last Execution
channels.description: Time/Date the command was last executed, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ format

channels.label: Input
channels.description: Input that will be passed as second parameter to the command

channels.label: Exit Value

channels.label: Access Token
channels.description: The access token used to authorize calls to the Spotify Web API. It can be used from rules or client-side scripting make call to Web API.

channels.label: Active Device Id
channels.description: The Spotify ID of active device

channels.label: Active Device Name
channels.description: The name of the currently active device

channels.label: Active Devices
channels.description: List of active devices.

channels.label: Active Device Type
channels.description: Currently active device type, such as "Computer", "Smartphone" or "Speaker".

channels.label: Volume
channels.description: Change the sound volume of a device

channels.label: Active Device Shuffle
channels.description: If shuffle is on or off on the active device

channels.label: Playlists
channels.description: List of the users playlists

channels.label: Playlist Name
channels.description: Name of the active playlist

channels.label: Track To Play
channels.description: Assign track, album, or playlist to play. Accepts Spotify Uri's and links.

channels.label: Repeat Mode
channels.description: 'track' will repeat the current track. 'context' will repeat the current context. 'off' will turn repeat off.

channels.label: Track Id
channels.description: Channel reports track id currently being played.

channels.label: Track URI
channels.description: The Spotify URI for the track currently played

channels.label: Media Title
channels.description: Title of a (played) media file

channels.label: Track Type
channels.description: The type of the track currently played track type

channels.label: Track Number
channels.description: The track number of currently played track

channels.label: Track Disc Number
channels.description: The disk number of currently played track

channels.label: Track Popularity
channels.description: The populatiry of the currently played track

channels.label: Track Duration ms
channels.description: The duration of the currently played track (ms)

channels.label: Track Progress ms
channels.description: The progress of the currently played track (ms)

channels.label: Track Duration (m:ss)
channels.description: The duration currently played track formatted (m:ss)

channels.label: Track Progress (m:ss)
channels.description: The progress of the currently played track formatted (m:ss)

channels.label: Album Id
channels.description: The Spotify ID of the album

channels.label: Album URI
channels.description: The Spotify URI for the album

channels.label: Album URL
channels.description: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the album

channels.label: Album Type
channels.description: The object type: "album"

channels.label: Album Image
channels.description: The cover art for the album in widest size

channels.label: Album Name
channels.description: The name of the album

channels.label: Artist Id
channels.description: The Spotify ID for the artist

channels.label: Artist URI
channels.description: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the artist

channels.label: Artist URL
channels.description: Channel reports currently played artist href

channels.label: Artist Type
channels.description: The object type: "artist"

channels.label: Media Artist
channels.description: Artist of a (played) media file

channels.label: Track To Play
channels.description: Assign track, album, or playlist to play. Accepts Spotify Uri's and links.

channels.label: Device Id
channels.description: The Spotify ID of the device

channels.label: Device Name
channels.description: The name of the device

channels.label: Device Type
channels.description: Device type, such as "Computer", "Smartphone" or "Speaker".

channels.label: Volume
channels.description: Change the sound volume of a device

channels.label: Device Active
channels.description: If this device is the currently active device

channels.label: Device Restricted
channels.description: Whether controlling this device is restricted. At present if this is "true" then no Web API commands will be accepted by this device

channels.label: Device Shuffle
channels.description: If shuffle is on or off

channels.label: RSSI
channels.description: Received signal strength indicator

channels.label: Color
channels.description: The color channel allows to control the color of a light. It is also possible to dim values and switch the light on and off.

channels.label: Color Temperature
channels.description: The color temperature channel allows to set the color temperature of a light from 0 (cold) to 100 (warm).

channels.label: Alert
channels.description: The alert channel allows a temporary change to the bulb’s state.

channels.label: Color Loop
channels.description: The effect channel allows putting the bulb in a color looping mode.

channels.label: Color Temperature
channels.description: The color temperature channel allows to set the color temperature of a light from 0 (cold) to 100 (warm).

channels.label: Brightness
channels.description: The brightness channel allows to control the brightness of a light. It is also possible to switch the light on and off.

channels.description: The alert channel allows a temporary change to the bulb’s state.

channels.label: Color Loop
channels.description: The effect channel allows putting the bulb in a color looping mode.
